name: Bat Sex and Coffee (Contains no Sex)
name_original: Bat Sex and Coffee (Contains no Sex)
description:
Note: SFW, despite the title.

This is a short vampire-themed romantic VN developed solo over two days, as a last-minute entry for a game jam. It follows a young vampire who has fallen in love with the hunter that stalks him, and seeks a cure so that they can be together.

Not sure on the run length, but definitely an in-one-sitting kind of game.
